name: Updated by Dependabot
description: Label for Mergify to automagically triage PRs from Dependabot.

name: dependencies
description: PRs with this label are usually contains dependency upgrades.

name: ci/github-actions
deecription: Changes to fhe base image, including upgrades made by Dependabot.

name: packages/docker-base-images
description: Changes to fhe base image, including upgrades made by Dependabot.

name: packages/nodejs-npm
description: PRs releated to upgrading Node.js tools we use like Commitizen and Commitlint.

name: Ready to Ship
description: PRs with this label are automagically merged by Mergify once approved. You can also add this through commenting LGTM for your bot account to approve it for you.

name: Blocked from Merging
description: When added, PRs will be blocked until either Ready to Ship is added or this one is removed.

name: WIP
description: Same as Blocked from Merging but used on draft PRs and WIPs.

name: automation/mergify-approve-rule
description: An label for automated PR approvals through Mergify.

name: code-server
description: Issues related to Code Server, mostly asked the issue author to move to the official repo.
